title: BONUS: BobbyCast - #98 - Dan from Dan + Shay
itunes:title: BONUS: BobbyCast - #98 - Dan from Dan + Shay
description:
Dan + Shay stopped by today after releasing their new song with Justin Bieber. 

Dan Smyers stopped by The BobbyCast a year ago to talk about his life story.  He talked about his pop punk days, how we would get by being broke, how they decided on a name and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
